description: Attribute id is responded to by parameter album-simple with a description: The Spotify ID for the artist
Attribute limit is responded to by parameter album-simple-page with a description: The maximum number of items to return
Attribute offset is responded to by parameter album-simple-page with a description: The index of the first item to return
Attribute market is responded to by parameter album-simple with a description: The market (an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code)
The total number of items available to return
The markets in which the album is available: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. Note that an album is considered available in a market when at least 1 of its tracks is available in that market
The type of the album: one of 'album', 'single', or 'compilation'
Known external URLs for this artist, schema: {"type": "object", "format": "uri"}
The source URL of the image, schema: {"type": "string", "format": "uri"}
The Spotify URI for the artist, schema: {"type": "string", "format": "uri"}
The image height in pixels. If unknown: null or not returned
URL to the previous page of items. (null if none
A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the album
The Spotify URI for the album, schema: {"type": "string", "format": "uri"}
A link to the Web API endpoint providing full details of the artist
URL to the next page of items. (null if none
